short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See which track of album/mix is playing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows the current track, with clickable progressbar, under title from tracklist available in description or comments.

Shows complete tracklist under info section.

I do not have any relation with YouTube and do not work at Google or YouTube!
